title: Create and push to remote repo on github.com
description: Add rhydlewis/BeancountAutocomplete as a manual task

title: Create README.md file that explains how to use the plugin
description: Create a short README.md file that explains how this plugin works, how to install etc. Make sure we specify how to set the `beancount_file` path. Look for other SublimeText plugins as a guide for what to include in this file.

title: Setup Semantic Versioning (Tags)
description: Package Control identifies new versions by looking at **Git Tags**. We will need to run `git tag -a v1.0.0 -m Initial
